Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Compartment Syndromes/Anterior Compartment Syndrome
Musculoskeletal Diseases/Muscular Diseases/Compartment Syndromes/Anterior Compartment Syndrome
Record.Description: Rapid swelling, increased tension, pain, and ischemic necrosis of the muscles of the anterior tibial compartment of the leg, often following excessive PHYSICAL EXERTION.
